content.question: The function f is continuous on the closed interval [1, 7 ]. If <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mn>7</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>42</mn></mrow> </math> and <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>7</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>32</mn></mrow> </math> then <math> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msubsup> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> </mstyle><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> </math>

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
